definition: if you marry a chicken follow the chicken, if you marry a dog follow the dog (idiom)
pinyin: jia4 ji1 sui2 ji1 , jia4 gou3 sui2 gou3

definition: (of a woman) to marry/to marry off a daughter/to shift (blame etc)
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
